creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: famille rose; arms of Skinner; spearhead border; four central reserves of emblems; pink ground rim with three flower sprays and family crest; four orange floral decorations on bottom edge, underside
text: The arms on this dish are of Skinner, descended from the Rt. Reverend Robert Skinner, Bishop of Bristol during the late seventeenth century. It is not known for which member of his family this service was ordered.
title: Dish with arms of Skinner
